text: Yavlyaya sebya mezhdu vami krayne korystolyubivymi. Kogda nastupit chto strashnoye, togda vidish', kak oni obrashchayut vzory k tebe: ochi ikh vorochayutsya kak u togo, kto pred smert'yu teryayet vsyu bodrost'. Kogda zhe proydet strashnoye; oni yazvyat vas ostrymi yazykami, buduchi krayne korystlivy pri razdele dobra. Takovyye yeshche ne sdelalis' veruyushchimi, i Bog sdelayet tshchetnymi dela ikh: eto legko dlya Boga
